insights.populationGrowth: Stable population with minimal growth (0.3% annually). Historical significance as birthplace of Genghis Khan attracts some cultural tourism employment.
insights.educationLevel: Good education levels with 79% literacy. Cultural heritage programs provide educational opportunities in traditional knowledge preservation.
insights.employmentPattern: Livestock herding 55%, agriculture 18%, tourism/cultural services 12%, government 8%, traditional crafts 7%. Growing cultural tourism sector.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional gers 50%, permanent houses 35%, seasonal camps 15%. Balance between traditional lifestyle and modern housing needs.

insights.temperature: Continental climate with cold winters (-28째C) and warm summers (28째C). Forest-steppe zone provides more moderate conditions than pure steppe regions.
insights.precipitation: Annual precipitation 300-350mm with summer concentration. Higher precipitation supports forest areas and better grasslands than southern regions.
insights.seasonality: Cold winter (November-March) with moderate dzud risk, pleasant spring (April-May), warm humid summer (June-August), colorful autumn (September-October) good for tourism.
insights.extremeEvents: Moderate dzud events, summer thunderstorms with hail risk, occasional forest fires during dry periods, flash flooding in mountainous areas.
